channel.title: Weapon specs someone please help
channel.description:
can someone please tell me how to add weapon specs. Dunno if this will help but i want to add a spec to maybe a meat tenderiser. If anyone could tell me how, I would be greatly thankful
-d man10345 __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ come on please someone help me, ive looked on the TuT section but couldnt find anything. I know somebody knows how to do thi

item.title: Weapon specs someone please help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

That’s useless. You’re calling a method that he most likely doesn’t even have.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon specs someone please help
item.dc:creator: @MoparUnited MoparUnited
item.description:
@MoparUnited wrote:

Put this code in client.java with all your other weapon public voids:

public void maulSpec() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153) { speC(1667, 30, 1, 30, 1); actionTimer = 4; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153) { speCP(30, 1, 1667, 4, 1); } }
And don’t forget to compile.This will make a perfect spec,but you got to do the rest your self.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon specs someone please help
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:

  1. Topic titles, use a brief descriptive title, a title such as “NEEEEED HELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP FAST!!!” is just annoying and won’t really help you get the help you need any faster.

rules
